Landslide Strike.name: Landslide Strike
Landslide Strike.flavor: You hurtle forward, lashing out with your weapons at the end of your advance.
Landslide Strike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Landslide Strike.effect: Before the attack, you can shift 2 squares.
Landslide Strike.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee; main weapon and off-hand weapon) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged), one attack per target

Quick-Draw Trick.name: Quick-Draw Trick
Quick-Draw Trick.flavor: You draw and stow your weapons with dazzling speed.
Quick-Draw Trick.effect: You draw or stow one or two weapons.

Eruption of Steel.name: Eruption of Steel
Eruption of Steel.flavor: After attacking with each of your weapons, you pause just long enough to find new targets for your furious assault.
Eruption of Steel.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Eruption of Steel.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee; main weapon and off-hand weapon) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Eruption of Steel.onHit: 2[W] (main weapon) + 2[W] (off-hand weapon) + Strength modifier + Dexterity modifier damage.
Eruption of Steel.secondaryTarget: One or two creatures other than the primary target
Eruption of Steel.secondaryAttack: Strength vs. AC (melee; main weapon and off-hand weapon) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged), one attack per target
